title: Clippers vs. Hornets Tickets Available – Sunday, March 16
description: The Los Angeles Clippers (32-28) clash with the Charlotte Hornets (14-45) at 7 p.m. ET on Sunday, March 16, 2025. The matchup airs on FDSSC and FDSSE. Looking for NBA tickets? Head to StubHub today and see your team live.
